item.title: CVE-2024-27991|2024-03-21T15:09:36.496Z -- SupportCandy -- SupportCandy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SupportCandy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SupportCandy: from n/a through 3.2.3.
